dublin_core.dcvalue: In this paper for the first time a heuristic network calculator for both whole body exposure due to indoor base station antennas or access points downlink exposure and localised exposure due to the mobile device uplink exposure in indoor wireless networks is presented As an application three phone call scenarios are investigated Universal Mobile Telecommunications System UMTS macrocell UMTS femtocell and WiFi voice over IP and compared with respect to the electric field strength and localised specific absorption rate SAR distribution Prediction models are created and successfully validated with an accuracy of 3 dB The benefits of the UMTS power control mechanisms are demonstrated However dependent on the macrocell connection quality and on the user s average phone call connection time also the macrocell solution might be preferential from an exposure point of view for the considered scenario
Prediction and comparison of downlink electric-field and uplink localised SAR values for realistic indoor wireless planning.
